Package no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.violations

Class Violation

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.violations.Violation
public class Violation extends Object
Represents a Checkstyle Rule violation. Holds details of where a violation occured, a summary of the rule violated and an optional RuleDefinition that can be shown to the end-user. Should be instantiated when a violation occurs, and passed to appropriate objects.

    • Violation

      public Violation(String summary, bluej.extensions2.BClass blueClass, bluej.extensions2.editor.TextLocation location, RuleDefinition ruleDefinition)
      Constructs a new Violation with a RuleDefinition.
      Parameters:
      summary - a String containing a brief explanation of the violation
      blueClass - the BlueJ Class file where the violation was found
      location - the TextLocation where the violation was found in the file
      ruleDefinition - a RuleDefinition containing a description of the violated rule
